reviewText: Does good job teaching it. Not everyone can teach like he can.

I really love learning from these DVDs! They are a great supplement to my Eagle Claw classes... if not better! I can now study and understand the moves in the quietude of my own space. The instructor's moves are beautiful to look at and in my appreciation, I strive to imitate and then feel what I want to achieve. Thank you very much!
Great product and Service. I had this from a few years ago on VHS and the copy is fantastic. Eagle Claw has been preserved by few as this Sifu.
